channel.title: Help my please with Member place
channel.description:
Hey..
i need help with a emotie that i tele to varrock statue... only for members...
and i want that there will by standing a shop keeper with selling bondos for only 100k...
and there must stand 2 ice queens and they saying: Member place!
and the emtie tele must called OFM = Only For Members...
please help my.. :confused: :| :(

item.title: Help my please with Member place
item.dc:creator: @Benz Benz
item.description:
@Benz wrote:

[quote=“loek20, post:8, topic:198648”]loook…

i am not so good in make this things i understand java… but i pull it in client.java and it dontworks 1of you saying and to tele by spellsid but i dont got that folder…![/quote]

Fail. It’s not a folder.

Every server has “run.bat” or “runserver.bat”

item.title: Help my please with Member place
item.dc:creator: @Benz Benz
item.description:
@Benz wrote:

Do the spawning + shops yourself, but I’ll help you out with the tele.
In client.java add:

case **TeleSpellID**://OFM Tele if(playerIsMember == 1){ teleportToX = XCORD; teleportToY = YCORD; heightLevel = 0; sendMessage("You teleport to the Only for Members' City!"); } else { sendMessage("You need to be a member to go here!"); } break;

You can find the TeleSpellID by clicking on the teleport spell you want, and then adding the ID that comes up in “runserver.bat”. If it is already used, search for the ID of it in client.java and replace it with what I have up there.

Read full topic

item.title: Help my please with Member place
item.dc:creator: @JRealm JRealm
item.description:
@JRealm wrote:

class memberDemo {
private int member = 0;

memberDemo() { System.out.println("A Class file written by JRealm to help loek20 out with his MemberShip."); }

private void member() {
if(member == 1) {
System.out.println("You are a Member! Cool!");
} else {
System.out.println("Members Only Feature.");
}
}

}

an Example with the if statement.
